pages.title: Rain Erosion
pages.text: As you probably figured out, rain erodes many blocks. $(br)Virtually all blocks naturally found on the surface of the world are immune. $(br)You haven't had any luck obtaining them though.

pages.title: Tungsten Mining
pages.text: Tungsten is an ore that can only be mined by amber or better tier pickaxes.

pages.title: Tungsten Building Materials
pages.text: Tungsten ingots can be crafted into a few different erosion proof blocks, which will surely help you in making safe growing environments for your plants.
